title: Slow Cooker Bacon-Wrapped Pork Tenderloin
directions: 1) On a clean surface, lay out bacon. Place pork loin on top of bacon and rub pork with oil, salt, pepper, garlic and brown sugar. Wrap bacon around the pork.
2) Place bacon-wrapped pork in a slow cooker, add water and cook on high for 2 hours.
3) After two hours, transfer pork loin to a lined baking tray and broil for 3 minutes, or until bacon is crispy.
4) Remove from oven, serve with your favorite dipping sauce and enjoy!
